name: A pitch black breastplate with a red rose on it
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (great in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'marksmanship'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
